page.description: Takes an array of JSON objects and populates an Xbasic property array.
page.example:
txt = <<%txt% [ {firstname: 'Fred', lastname: 'Smith', married: true, kids: 2} , {firstname: 'richard', lastname: 'smith'} ] %txt%
dim arr[0] as p a5_JSON_PopulateArray(arr,txt) Â ?arr.size() = 2
?arr[1] = firstname = "Fred" kids = 2 lastname = "Smith" married = .T.
